mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS rank, a.* FROM ( SELECT c.cosmetic_no, c.name, c.cate_cd, c.company_name, c.cos_image, ROUND(AVG(r.star_score), 2) AS star_score, COUNT(r.cosmetic_no) AS review_count, (ROUND(AVG(r.star_score), 2) * 10) + (COUNT(r.cosmetic_no) * 0.5) AS rank_score, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY (ROUND(AVG(r.star_score), 2) * 10) + (COUNT(r.cosmetic_no) * 0.5) DESC) AS rating FROM cosmetic c JOIN review r ON c.cosmetic_no = r.cosmetic_no LEFT JOIN category_code cat ON c.cate_cd = cat.cate_cd WHERE (#{cateCd} IS NULL OR c.cate_cd = #{cateCd} OR cat.cate_parent = #{cateCd}) GROUP BY c.cosmetic_no, c.name, c.cate_cd, c.company_name, c.cos_image ORDER BY rating ) a ORDER BY rank

SELECT ROWNUM AS rank, a.* FROM ( SELECT c.cosmetic_no, c.name, c.cate_cd, c.company_name, c.cos_image, ROUND(AVG(r.star_score), 2) AS star_score, COUNT(r.cosmetic_no) AS review_count, (ROUND(AVG(r.star_score), 2) * 10) + (COUNT(r.cosmetic_no) * 0.5) AS rank_score, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY (ROUND(AVG(r.star_score), 2) * 10) + (COUNT(r.cosmetic_no) * 0.5) DESC) AS rating FROM cosmetic c JOIN review r ON c.cosmetic_no = r.cosmetic_no JOIN member_addInfo ma ON r.mem_id = ma.mem_id LEFT JOIN category_code cat ON c.cate_cd = cat.cate_cd WHERE -- 피부타입 조건 (:1 = 피부타입(예: '건성'), :2 = 카테고리코드) (#{faceType} = 'ALL' OR ma.face_type = #{faceType} OR ma.add_type1 = #{faceType} OR ma.add_type2 = #{faceType}) AND -- 카테고리 조건 (#{categoryCd} = 'ALL' OR c.cate_cd = #{categoryCd} OR cat.cate_parent = #{categoryCd}) GROUP BY c.cosmetic_no, c.name, c.cate_cd, c.company_name, c.cos_image ORDER BY rating ) a ORDER BY rank
